description: This notice does not provide a detailed notice description. To view the complete procurement description, please see the procurement documents linked at the bottom of this page.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Award: Pendrell Sound Ghost Gear Clean-up

Below are the details of a government bid award issued by Fisheries and Oceans Canada for the Pendrell Sound Ghost Gear Clean-up project.

#### Tender Details

* **Title:** Pendrell Sound Ghost Gear Clean-up
* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01016545
* **Solicitation Number:** 30003622
* **Publication Date:** 2022-12-08
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-03T14:00:00

#### Overview

Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking proposals for the cleanup of abandoned subtidal aquaculture gear in Pendrell Sound, BC. The project aims to clean up and remove the gear that remains in the Pendrell Sound Rockfish Conservation Area, East Redonda Island, British Columbia.

The selected contractor will be required to provide their own vessels, a full dive team, a crew capable of surveying and cleaning the intertidal shoreline, and appropriate Remotely Operated Vehicles (ROV) capacity.

**Key Requirements**

* Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement: This procurement is subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements with the British Columbia First Nations.
* Ownership of Intellectual Property: The Crown retains the full ownership of intellectual property.
* Security Requirement: None
* Period of Contract: March 31, 2023

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority:** Olivier Trinh
* **Phone Number:** 873-455-0475
* **Email Address:** DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* **cc:** olivier.trinh@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

#### Tender Documents

Tender documents are available for download from the Canada Buy and Sell website:

* [English] - https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/08/84811ebc20c109a7c15810c9ad7f2834/30003622_-_rfp_en.pdf
* [French] - https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/08/a4319b84f04006240997f67799f0bf33/30003622_-_rfp_fr.pdf

Upon review of this information, we do hope that it meets your expectations. Thank you for your time. 

Best regards,
[Your Name]  #document #retrad
